Package jwo.utils.gui.html

Classes for creating improved HTML handling in GUI components.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
HTMLRadioButton A radio button that can display any HTML code including relative and absolute links to local or remote images, hyperlinks etc.
ImprovedHTMLEditorKit HTML editor kit to replace the default one used by JEditorPane.
ImprovedHTMLEditorKit.HTMLFactoryX A customised view factory that contains an image viewer that can cope with relative links.
ImprovedImageView Customised image viewer for use by an HTML editor kit.
 

Package jwo.utils.gui.html Description

Classes for creating improved HTML handling in GUI components.

These classes improve on the relatively poor handling of HTML in Swing and AWT components. It is expected that these will be superceded by better HTML handling in Java 1.5 and beyond.

Related Documentation

  • Java Programming for Spatial Sciences
Version 2.3, 5th October, 2007
